document_data.name: Blackbutter Inn
document_data.mainbody: '''Blackbutter Inn''' was an inn owned by [[Dhelosk Quelbeard]] in the town of [[Red Larch]].
document_data.Structure: The inn was a two-story building of stone and timber with a covered porch that ran parallel to the [[Long Road]].
document_data.History: The Blackbutter Inn was named after the [[Barglun Blackbutter]], the founder and previous owner of the inn who was killed around [[1365 DR]].
